BLOG

>

Good morning/afternoon, dear professors. I am really glad to be here for this interview. My name is qiyi, 22 years old. I was born in Wuhan, a brave city in Hubei province.

I had been exposed to computer long before I went to Wuhan Textile University. Therefore, I officially became a student majoring in computer science. Through studying Professional knowledge and reading books or documents involving relevant specialty, I find myself gradually enchanted with computer world and desired to continue my learning, which means I choose to go further with my study to achieve a masters degree.

During four years of college life under the epidemic. I have been studying very hard and learned a lot of open source project in online BBS. In addition, I participated in various subject competitions actively such as Mathematical Contest in Modeling(MCM) and LAN QIAO Program Competition. I used to build website by springboot, study finite automata and NAT traverse. These days, I am learning the recommendation system in MIcrosoft News Dataset(MIND) which is lead by Mr. Wu fangzhao. All of this has benefited me a lot.

In my spare timeI enjoy taking part in some activities held by student clubs. Moreover, jogging, tennis and Chinese chess, which enrich my campus life very much.

At Last, I am easy-going and warm-hearted, therefore, I have established good relationship with my classmates. Hubei University, where a place contains extraordinary potential and infinite possibilities. I would appreciate it if you could give me the chance to take a refresher study.

Thats all, Thank you!

>

  • SpringQQ2048AI

    Yes, I used to build web by spring, Information Management System, QQ like chat system, unity game, Gobang AI.

  • Yes, Mathematical Contest in Modeling(MCM) and LAN QIAO Program Competition.

  • NLPMIND

    I used to participate in learning NLP medical diagnosis. And now I am learning Mr. Wu fangzhaos recommendation system in MIcrosoft News Dataset(MIND).

  • GAN

    My Graduation project is the Generative Adversarial Networks(GAN), which is an algorithm of deep learning. It can automatically learn and generate new samples based on existing data. For example, pictures.

  • I hope to be engaged in big data or cloud, which is my major and my strength. At the same time, I will also study cross fields, which is my hobby.

  • I will follow the professor to determine the research direction, finish the courses that is essential, then start learning papers towards the research content, and try to reproduce the existing open source projects. If necessary, I will continue my research and study to earn the PHD degree.

  • I like the compiler theory best, which is the basis of all computers which connects OS and programming language. Starting from here, combined with my extensive mathematical knowledge, I can understand computers more thoroughly.

  • Hubei University is located in Wuhan and has unlimited development potential. I hope to make a contribution to this University.

  • Through studying Professional knowledge and reading books or documents involving relevant specialty, I find myself gradually enchanted with computer world and desired to continue my learning, which means I choose to go further with my study to achieve a masters degree.

  • BLOG

    In my spare timeI enjoy taking part in some activities held by student clubs. Moreover, jogging, tennis and Chinese chess, which enrich my campus life very much.

  • BLOG

    I like technology. If conditions permit, I prefer to get a PhD. But even if I enter the work, I will continue my study and blog.

  • In Wuhan, we pefer to eat fish and hot dry noodles. Im in Qingshan, where WISCO ,a state-owned iron and steel enterprise, is here. That shows that our body and mind will be as strong as steel.

  • My father is a senior skilled worker in WISCO and my mother is a tailor. Simple life makes me precocious and know how to care for others.

  • When I was in primary school, once I used to work out the optimal solution of the seven bridge problem with my father which takes a lot of paper. This challenge made me very excited. Since then, I have loved mathematics and the achievements brought by it.


I am sorry, but would you like to repeat again?
I am sorry, but I beg your pardon.
